scripts.build:angular: mkdir -p build/angular && cp src/angular/index.html build/angular && browserify ./src/angular/index.js --debug --outfile ./build/angular/index.js
scripts.build:jquery: mkdir -p build/jquery && cp src/jquery/index.html build/jquery && browserify ./src/jquery/index.js --debug --outfile ./build/jquery/index.js
scripts.build:react: mkdir -p build/react && cp src/react/index.html build/react && browserify --transform reactify ./src/react/index.js --debug --outfile ./build/react/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rfd build/* && npm run build:copy && npm run build:angular && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:react
